pr_title: [component/functions|component/go] Propagate user-config parameter into instances of Golang pulsar functions

timeline.message: feat(pulsar-functions): Add user-config support to Golang function instance
feat(pulsar-function-go): Add userConfig field to function instance configuration
feat(pulsar-function-go): Expose user config in FunctionContext
